channel.title: Comments on: Tapping Into Your Reporting Services Database
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: ssrsreporting
item.dc:creator: ssrsreporting
item.description: Useful example of SSRS reports that are tapping into SSRS database: http://www.rbreporting.com/ssrs_reports.htm<br /> These reports help to track executions, subscriptions and dependencies.
item.content:encoded:
Useful example of SSRS reports that are tapping into SSRS database: http://www.rbreporting.com/ssrs_reports.htm
These reports help to track executions, subscriptions and dependencies.

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: You know that those views won't be sorted right? Since SQL Server 2005 this has changed, see here: <a href="/index.php/DataMgmt/DataDesign/create-a-sorted-view-in-sql-server-2005--2008">Create a sorted view in SQL Server 2005 and SQL Server 2008</a>
item.content:encoded: You know that those views won’t be sorted right? Since SQL Server 2005 this has changed, see here: Create a sorted view in SQL Server 2005 and SQL Server 2008
